item.title: Big Ass Fans introduces revamped Haiku app
item.description: Big Ass Fans® today introduced an updated version of its Haiku® ceiling fan control app for Android devices. Easier to use, faster and just all around more incredible, the app offers unprecedented control options for the company’s Haiku residential ceiling fans. The company’s extensive engineering team worked directly with customers throughout the year-long development process, […]
item.author: (Big Ass Fans)

item.title: World ID @ Mina | ETHGlobal
item.description: Bring World ID to Mina, as a core building block for zkApps, to enable all kinds of use cases from private voting, private transaction and more. It includes a demo UI and mock sequencer.

item.title: Internet disruptions registered as Russia moves in on Ukraine - NetBlocks
item.description: Network data from NetBlocks confirm a series of significant disruptions to internet service in Ukraine from Thursday 24 February 2022. Disruptions have subsequently been tracked across much of Ukraine including ...

item.title: Read CSV File in .NET using CsvHelper | C# Tutorials Blog
item.description: If you need to seed a database from a .csv file in .NET, the CsvHelper library is an indispensable tool.

item.title: Microsoft Confirms Server Misconfiguration Led to 65,000+ Companies' Data Leak
item.description: Microsoft has confirmed that it inadvertently exposed information related to thousands of customers following a security lapse.
item.author: (https://www.facebook.com/thehackernews)

item.title: News: Postgres 15 available in Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL
item.description: PostgreSQL 15 major version support is now generally available in the Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL service, within just 1 week of the PostgreSQL 15 release. Powered by Citus open source, Azure Cosmos DB for PostgreSQL gives you true Postgres in a cloud database, with distributed scale.
item.author: (Twitter icon @MfstNik)
